100 Days sass

Project built using custom build script to compile html into a single build file. SASS compiled into CSS and injected into main file head style.

100
DAYS
CSS CHALLENGE

background-image, color, display, flex-direction, justify-content, align-items, font-size, line-height

Day #2

Day #3
